channel.title: Soul Split Source/Client 474 GFX
channel.description: Problem: When I download a source / client I first go to Client.Java and change the old IP address to localhost 127.0.0.1 and login and check it out. Well, I found one I really liked and I changed it to my no-ip.com IP address and it will not connect. I have port-fowarded and everything else. I CAN login with 127.0.0.1 (localhost) but CANT with my no-ip.com IP address if you know were this problem is occuring at I am actually willing to pay 10$USD to the first person who decides to help and also if they'd like to play the server will be recieving admin. Thanks for your time!

item.title: Soul Split Source/Client 474 GFX
item.dc:creator: @Dynasty474 Dynasty474
item.description:
@Dynasty474 wrote:

This is how you make a server-

Portforward port 43594

Make a port, via Windows Firewall. Port 43594

Open port 43594.

Go into your server files and press run.

Open your client, press run.

If you have problems, then its probably your source/client.

Read full topic

item.title: Soul Split Source/Client 474 GFX
item.dc:creator: @whitefang1 whitefang1
item.description:
@whitefang1 wrote:

I Vain I:

The hoster never logs in with the dynamic address.

in other words YOU Julie as ur the one that hosts the server you need to use 127.0.0.1 not your no-ip its your other players that need to use the no-ip adress

Read full topic
